title: Poster, "New Achitectural Exhibition - Mars Group at New Burlington Galleries", 1937
medium: Lithograph, red ink stamped on tan wove paper
markings: Stamped in red ink, upper left: MADE IN ENGLAND
signed: Signed in stone, lower center right: E. McKnight Kauffer '37
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description:
Central image, resembling an abstracted hourglass, consists of gray and blue solid geometric shapes linked by a black linear element. Surrounding the image are words pertaining to the architecture exhibition in blue, gray and black lettering, in both capital and lower case. The poster celebrates am exhibition of modern architecture, designed by the MARS group, held at the New Burlington Gallery in London, from January 12th to 29th, 1938. 
New Architecture/ Exhibition of / The Elements of / A / Modern Architecture / Designed by /  MARS Group / New Burlington Galleries / Burlington Gardens W 1 / January 12th to 29th 1038 / 10 A.M. to 8 P.M. Admission 1/-.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "New Achitectural Exhibition - Mars Group at New Burlington Galleries", 1937.
1937. Lithograph, red ink stamped on tan wove paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-97.
